prompt.content: Based on CAKEâ€™s 10-Ks, 10-Qs, and press releases, retrieve the end-of-period (EOP) number of company-owned The Cheesecake Factory restaurants for the last four quarters, along with the corresponding sales for that segment in each quarter. Finally, calculate the average unit volume (AUV) per restaurant for each quarter using the average number of company-owned The Cheesecake Factory stores. Express the number of stores as whole numbers, AUV in thousands of USD, and total sales in USD millions.
